body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gerald Nelson and the customer's name is Lori Russell.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling ABC Assistance. My name is Jane. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jane, I'm having trouble with my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Mark. Can you please provide your order number so I can look it up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The order number is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. I see the order here. Could you also provide the email address you used for the order?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Mark. I have all the details I need. I'll look into this and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jane. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Mark. Thank you for your time, and have a wonderful day!
